data.convo: Hard to complain too much about a $7 buffet. Food wasn't bad, I've certainly had worse Indian in Pittsburgh. Limited selection that they don't refill often enough. Odd atmosphere, they need some background music or something. The soap opera on tv just didn't cut it. They do give you fresh naan bread which is nice, old buffet naan always sucks. Good if you're in the area and need a cheap lunch but not worth going out of your way for.
